AbstractRaidDynamicEnum.description: This dynamic enumeration is part of the Research Activity Identifier (RAiD) controlled lists available at https://vocabulary.raid.org/.
AbstractRaidDynamicEnum.title: AbstractRaidDynamicEnum

Access.description: a metadata schema block containing RAiD access information

embargoExpiry.description: the date any embargo on access to the RAiD metadata ends

statement.description: a metadata schema block containing an explanation for any access type that is not ‘open’, with the explanation’s associated properties

type.description: a metadata schema block containing RAiD access type information

Access.title: Access

AccessStatement.description: a metadata schema block containing an explanation for any access type that is not ‘open’, with the explanation’s associated properties.

language.description: a metadata schema block declaring the language of the text

text.description: the text of an access statement that explains any restrictions on access

AccessStatement.title: AccessStatement

id.description: the type of access granted to a RAiD metadata record

schemaUri.description: the URI of the access type schema

AlternateIdentifier.description: a metadata schema block containing alternative local or global identifiers for the project or activity associated with the RAiD

id.description: an identifier other than the RAiD applied to the project or activity

type.description: free text description of the type of alternateIdentifier supplied

AlternateIdentifier.title: AlternateIdentifier

AlternateUrl.description: a metadata schema block containing alternative URLs for the project

url.description: a link to another website related to the project or activity

AlternateUrl.title: AlternateUrl

Contributor.description: a metadata schema block containing a contributor to a RAiD and their associated properties

contact.description: flag indicating that the contributor as a project contact

id.description: the contributor (person) associated with a project or activity identified by a persistent identifier (PID)

leader.description: flag indicating that the contributor as a project leader

position.description: a metadata schema sub-block describing a contributor’s administrative position on a project or activity

role.description: metadata schema sub-block describing a contributor’s scientific or scholarly role on a project using the CRediT vocabulary

schemaUri.description: the URI of the contributor identifier schema

Contributor.title: Contributor

ContributorPosition.description: a metadata schema sub-block describing a contributor’s administrative position on a project or activity

endDate.description: date the contributor terminated position associated with the project or activity

id.description: a contributor’s administrative position in the project

schemaUri.description: the URI of the position schema used

startDate.description: date the contributor began position associated with the project or activity

ContributorPosition.title: ContributorPosition

id.description: a contributor’s (person) role(s) on the Project

schemaUri.description: the URI of the role schema used

Date.description: Metadata schema block containing the start and end date of the RAiD.

endDate.description: the project or activity’s end date

startDate.description: the project or activity’s start date

Date.title: Date

Description.description: a metadata schema block containing the description of the RAiD and associated properties

language.description: a metadata schema block declaring the language of the text

text.description: the text of an access statement that explains any restrictions on access

type.description: a metadata schema block declaring the type of description

Description.title: Description

DescriptionType.description: a metadata schema block declaring the type of description

id.description: the type of description.

schemaUri.description: the URI of the description type schema

DescriptionType.title: DescriptionType

Id.description: a metadata schema block containing the RAiD name and associated properties.

id.description: The identifier of the raid, e.g. https://raid.org.au/102.100.100/zzz

license.description: The license under which the RAiD Metadata Record associated with this Identifier has been issued.

owner.description: a metadata schema sub-block that declares the owner of the RAiD (i.e. the organisation requesting the RAiD)

raidAgencyUrl.description: The URL for the raid via the minting raid agency system

registrationAgency.description: metadata schema sub-block declaring the Registration Agency that minted the RAiD.

schemaUri.description: The URI of the Identifier scheme. For example, https://raid.org

version.description: The version of the resource. Read-only. Increments automatically on update.

Id.title: Id

id.description: the language used for the access statement text, identified by a code or other identifier

schemaUri.description: the URI of the language identifier schema

Organisation.description: a metadata schema block containing the organisation associated with a RAiD and its associated properties

id.description: an organisation associated with a project or activity

role.description: a metadata schema sub-block describing an organisation’s role on a project

schemaUri.description: the URI of the organisation identifier schema

Organisation.title: Organisation

OrganisationRole.description: a metadata schema sub-block describing an organisation’s role on a project

endDate.description: the date that the organisation terminated a role associated with the project or activity

id.description: the organisation’s role

schemaUri.description: the URI of the role schema used

startDate.description: the date that the organisation began a role associated with the project or activity

OrganisationRole.title: OrganisationRole

id.description: the persistent identifier of the legal entity responsible for the RAiD (i.e. the ‘owner’ of a RAiD); as recognised by their Registration Agency

schemaUri.description: the URI of the identifier scheme that is used to identify RAiD owners

servicePoint.description: the Service Point (SP) that requested the RAiD. SPs belong to an owner, RAiD owners can have multiple SPs; SPs do not need to be legal entities

spatialCoverage.description: metadata schema block containing information about any spatial region(s) or named place(s) targeted by the project

subject.description: metadata schema block containing the subject area of the RAiD plus associated properties

traditionalKnowledgeLabel.description: metadata schema block containing information about Traditional Knowledge / Biocultural Labels and Notices

spatialCoverage.description: metadata schema block containing information about any spatial region(s) or named place(s) targeted by the project

subject.description: metadata schema block containing the subject area of the RAiD plus associated properties

traditionalKnowledgeLabel.description: metadata schema block containing information about Traditional Knowledge / Biocultural Labels and Notices

spatialCoverage.description: metadata schema block containing information about any spatial region(s) or named place(s) targeted by the project

subject.description: metadata schema block containing the subject area of the RAiD plus associated properties

traditionalKnowledgeLabel.description: metadata schema block containing information about Traditional Knowledge / Biocultural Labels and Notices

RegistrationAgency.description: metadata schema sub-block declaring the Registration Agency that minted the RAiD.

id.description: the persistent identifier of the RAiD Registration Agency that minted the RAiD

schemaUri.description: the URI of the identifier scheme that is used to identify RAiD Registration Agencies

RegistrationAgency.title: RegistrationAgency

RelatedObject.description: a metadata schema block containing inputs, outputs, and process documents related to a RAiD plus associated properties

category.description: a metadata schema sub-block declaring that a relatedObject is an input, output and/or process document

id.description: any (a) input or resource used by a project or activity, (b) output or product created by a project or activity, and/or (c) internal process documentation used within a project or activity, that is identified by a persistent identifier (PID).

schemaUri.description: The URI of the relatedObject identifier schema

type.description: a metadata schema sub-block describing a relatedObject’s type

RelatedObject.title: RelatedObject

RelatedObjectCategory.description: a metadata schema sub-block declaring that a relatedObject is an input, output and/or process document

id.description: a declaration of an object as an input, output, or other

schemaUri.description: the URI of the category schema used.

RelatedObjectCategory.title: RelatedObjectCategory

RelatedObjectType.description: a metadata schema sub-block describing a relatedObject’s type

id.description: a type of input, output, or process document

schemaUri.description: the URI of the type schema used

RelatedObjectType.title: RelatedObjectType

RelatedRaid.description: a metadata schema block containing related RAiDs and qualifying the relationship

id.description: a subsidiary or otherwise related RAiD

type.description: a metadata schema sub-block qualifying the relationship with a related Raid

RelatedRaid.title: RelatedRaid

RelatedRaidType.description: a metadata schema sub-block qualifying the relationship with a related Raid

id.description: a description of the relationship between the activity being registered and the related resource

schemaUri.description: The URI of the relationship schema used

RelatedRaidType.title: RelatedRaidType

SpatialCoverage.description: metadata schema block containing information about any spatial region(s) or named place(s) targeted by the project

id.description: spatial region or named place that is the subject or target of the project or activity. Repeat this property as necessary to indicate different locations. Do not duplicate organisational locations

place.description: metadata schema sub-block containing free-text place names or descriptions plus associated metadata properties

schemaUri.description: the URI of the geolocation schema used for spatialCoverage

SpatialCoverage.title: SpatialCoverage

SpatialCoveragePlace.description: metadata schema sub-block containing free-text place names or descriptions plus associated metadata properties

language.description: a metadata schema block declaring the language of the text

text.description: free text description of one or more geographic locations that are the subject or target of the project or activity; use to specify or describe a geographic location in a manner not covered by spatialCoverage.id

SpatialCoveragePlace.title: SpatialCoveragePlace

Subject.description: metadata schema block containing the subject area of the RAiD plus associated properties

id.description: identifier (URI) for a subject area or classification code describing the project or activity

keyword.description: metadata schema sub-block containing free-text keyword describing a project plus associated properties

schemaUri.description: the URI of the subject identifier schema

Subject.title: Subject

SubjectKeyword.description: metadata schema sub-block containing free-text keyword describing a project plus associated properties

language.description: a metadata schema block declaring the language of the text

text.description: unconstrained keyword or key phrase describing the project or activity

SubjectKeyword.title: SubjectKeyword

Title.description: a metadata schema block containing the title of the RAiD and associated properties

endDate.description: the date the project or activity title was changed or stopped being used

language.description: a metadata schema block declaring the language of the text

startDate.description: the date the project or activity’s title began being used

text.description: a name or title by which the project or activity is known

type.description: a metadata schema block containing information about the title type

Title.title: Title

TraditionalKnowledgeLabel.description: metadata schema block containing information about Traditional Knowledge / Biocultural Labels and Notices

id.description: identifier (URI) linking to a verified source for Traditional Knowledge (TK) or Biocultural (BC) Labels or Notices pertaining to a project or activity

schemaUri.description: the URI of the Traditional Knowledge or Biocultural label identifier schema

TraditionalKnowledgeLabel.title: TraditionalKnowledgeLabel
